pages.text: In this chapter, we will learn how to create a dungeon key in order to run a dungeon. You will first need to craft a $(h)Key Generator$(). Once you have crafted the $(h)Key Generator$() you can plonk it down, and right click on it to open its GUI. The machine produces a key every 8 real life hours, but you get 1 for $(h)free$(). $(br)$(o)NOTE: You can only place 1 key generator.$()
$(o)Dont worry, there are other ways to make $(h)Dungeon Keys$(), but you will need to run your first dungeon first.
